text: Bad Windsheim is a small town in Bavaria, Germany. It is in Neustadt an der Aisch-Bad Windsheim, west of Nuremberg. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bad Windsheim official website * Weinturm Open Air official website * Fr√§nkisches Freilandmuseum official website * Frankentherme Bad Windsheim official website Category:Neustadt (Aisch)-Bad Windsheim Category:Spa towns in Germany
title: Bad Windsheim
